item.description:
Microphone, the internationally acclaimed and award winning Egyptian film will have it’s New England screening debut at 3PM on Saturday, June 18th at the Brattle Theater in Harvard Square.
Trailer: http://vimeo.com/1724...
For more information and to Purchase Tickets: www.cacboston.org
or call us at: 877.CAC.9740 x 702 or at 617.453.8623

“Microphone is a film that gives a microphone ‘a voice’ to the young underground artists in Alexandria today, it is a voice that speaks for all the Egyptian artists who have their own style and art.”- Khaled Abol Naga, Co-producer and Actor-Microphone

This film is in Arabic with English Subtitles!
item.name: Microphone- an Egyptian Film
